text: Kaya tumhi (hajarata) yakubacya mrtyusamayi hajara hote? Jevha tyanni apalya santatila mhatale ki tumhi majhya mrtyunantara konaci upasana karala? Tevha sarvanni uttara dile ki tumacya palanakartyaci ani tumace vadavadila ibrahima ani isma'ila ani isahaka yancya upasya (daivata) ci, jo ekameva ahe ani amhi tyaceca tabedara banuna rahu
